title: E140 Psychedelic Conversations and the Frogman's Lazy River
description:
We're officially into Spook-tober! And we're advocating for fingerprinting every "pillar of the community" just in case! We're also bringing the creep factor with the Loveland Frogmen of Ohio, which may or may not be frozen iguanas? Meanwhile, Christine covers the wild tale of the Rotherham Shoe Rapist and the advances in familial DNA that played a role in his capture. Also please congratulate Christine on her latest Stardew Valley child and tune in to hear who she named him after... and that's why we drink toilet wine!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 
Try Zip Recruiter for free when you go to ZipRecruiter.com/drink
For a limited time, thredUP is offering an extra 30% off your first order when you go to http://thredup.com/drink 
Go to Rothys.com/drink to get your new favorite flats! 
Visit http://ritual.com/ATWWD to start your ritual today
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
